channel.title: OS-Legacy || A Server Meeting Your Needs
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2s5zklj.png[/img]
[SIZE=5][B][URL=http://"http://os-legacy.com/"]Website[/URL] ||[URL=http://"http://os-legacy.com/forums/"] Forums[/URL] || [URL=http://"http://os-legacy.com/OS-Legacy%20v1.0.jar"]Download[/URL][/B][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][B]Welcome to OS - Legacy![/B] OS-Legacy is a brand new Server, looking to provide a unique experience! We want our players to enjoy every minute they play of the server and to ensure we deliver on our promises. We have a brilliant development team working around the clock on constant updates & fixes to maintain the server and ensure the best Gaming Experience.
[CENTER][SIZE=4][B]Noticeable Features:[/B]
[ul][*]Re-Sizeable Client! [*]Boss Pets. [*]Old School Runescape Items. [*]Achievement Diaries. [*]Boss & Slayer Kill Logs. [*]Iron-Man Mode. [*]Working Duel Arena. [*]Barrows Minigame. [*]Working Warriors Guild with animated armour! [*]Clue Scroll System - Easy, Medium & Hard (Elite Coming Soon). [*]Pest-Control Minigame. [*]11 Bosses + Godwars Dungeon! [*]All 21 Skills Working! [*]Working Slayer & Duo Slayer, with the ability to ask for a boss slayer task. [*]Working Lootshare if a Rare Drop is obtained by a player. [*]Working Voting & Donating Systems, with In-Game Stores. [*]Working PvP System (Bounty Hunter Coming Soon).[/ul]
[/CENTER]
[SIZE=4][B]Media[/B]
[B]OSRS Content and some other items that might get your attention![/B] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2h3ppgy.jpg[/img]
[B]100% Toxic Blowpipe![/B] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/e9izj7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/kb3wgy.jpg[/img]
[B]Fight bosses to fill your bank! But beware of the hungry pkers![/B] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/295y7uv.png[/img]
[B]Resize as the game fits you the best![/B] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2hoiogp.png[/img]
[B]Test your luck with different clue scrolls[/B] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2r4k6xw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/ru05r8.png[/img]
[B]Fight your way to become the mightiest pker![/B] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/15n8290.png[/img]
[B]Zulrah (Comming Soon)![/B] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/15quoup.png[/img]
[/CENTER]
Sincerely ~ [B][I]OS-Legacy Developement Team[/I][/B]

item.title: OS-Legacy || A Server Meeting Your Needs
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

I suppose the full screen mode is alright, but other than that I don’t see anything special that would make me want to play this rather than the other OSRS remakes.

Goodluck regardless.

Read full topic
item.source: OS-Legacy || A Server Meeting Your Needs

item.title: OS-Legacy || A Server Meeting Your Needs
item.dc:creator: @OS-legacy OS-legacy
item.description:
@OS-legacy wrote:

[CENTER]

[SIZE=5]Website || Forums || Download[/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]Welcome to OS - Legacy!
OS-Legacy is a brand new Server, looking to provide a unique experience!
We want our players to enjoy every minute they play of the server and to ensure we deliver on our promises.
We have a brilliant development team working around the clock on constant updates & fixes to maintain the server and ensure the best Gaming Experience.

[CENTER][SIZE=4]Noticeable Features:

[ul][]Re-Sizeable Client!
[]Boss Pets.
[]Old School Runescape Items.
[]Achievement Diaries.
[]Boss & Slayer Kill Logs.
[]Iron-Man Mode.
[]Working Duel Arena.
[]Barrows Minigame.
[]Working Warriors Guild with animated armour!
[]Clue Scroll System - Easy, Medium & Hard (Elite Coming Soon).
[]Pest-Control Minigame.
[]11 Bosses + Godwars Dungeon!
[]All 21 Skills Working!
[]Working Slayer & Duo Slayer, with the ability to ask for a boss slayer task.
[]Working Lootshare if a Rare Drop is obtained by a player.
[]Working Voting & Donating Systems, with In-Game Stores.
[*]Working PvP System (Bounty Hunter Coming Soon).[/ul]

[/CENTER]

[SIZE=4]Media

OSRS Content and some other items that might get your attention!

2h3ppgy.jpg597×602

100% Toxic Blowpipe!

e9izj7.jpg759×498

Fight bosses to fill your bank! But beware of the hungry pkers!

Resize as the game fits you the best!

2hoiogp.png1599×848

Test your luck with different clue scrolls

2r4k6xw.png765×501
ru05r8.png761×502

Fight your way to become the mightiest pker!

15n8290.png764×499

Zulrah (Comming Soon)!

15quoup.png1366×704

[/CENTER]

Sincerely ~ OS-Legacy Developement Team
